pageContent: Purpose: Overall 1 in 5 patients with prostate cancer has a positive family history. In this report we evaluated the association between family history and long-term outcomes following radical prostatectomy.

metaData.source:
Changes in patterns of prostate cancer care in the United States: results of American College of Surgeons Commission on Cancer studies, 1974-1993
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/9254902/
